sentences.en: ...people doing extra jobs outside their regular jobs to supplement their incomes.
sentences.cn: …在固定工作之余做兼职以增加收入的人们。

sentences.en: A supplement to this dictionary may be published next year.
sentences.cn: 该词典的补编或许将于明年出版.

sentences.en: Business sponsorship must be a supplement to, not a substitute for, public funding.
sentences.cn: 商业赞助必须是公共基金的一种补充，而不能取而代之。

sentences.en: I had been so enthralled by reading the serial stories in the magazine supplement.
sentences.cn: 我一直迷恋着阅读杂志增刊上的连载小说.

sentences.en: It comes out each week and it has a magazine supplement.
sentences.cn: 每周出版一期,还附有杂志增刊.

sentences.en: Kia supplements her regular salary by tutoring in the evenings.
sentences.cn: 基亚晚上做家庭教师来帮补固定的薪水。

sentences.en: Magmas in transit to the surface will further supplement this heat.
sentences.cn: 向地表运移的岩浆将进一步补充这种热量.

sentences.en: She gives private lessons to supplement her income.
sentences.cn: 她给私人授课以贴补收入.

sentences.en: Single people are treated as an aberration and made to pay a supplement.
sentences.cn: 独身者被当成异类，而且要付一笔额外的费用。

sentences.en: Soldiers in both countries supplement their incomes with payoffs from drugs exporters.
sentences.cn: 两国士兵都用毒品走私贩的贿赂来贴补收入。

sentences.en: The meeting was very lively and informal with everyone chipping to supplement or refute what the speakers said.
sentences.cn: 会议开得很活跃,不拘束,每个人都能插话补充,或反驳发言者的讲话.

sentences.en: The money I get from teaching the piano is a useful supplement to my ordinary income.
sentences.cn: 我教钢琴挣的钱是一笔很管用的外快.

sentences.en: The money they get from fruit - picking is often a supplement to incomes earned in the town.
sentences.cn: 他们靠采摘水果所得的钱常常是城里所挣收入的补贴.

sentences.en: The payments are a supplement to his usual salary.
sentences.cn: 这些钱是他平常工资之外的补充。

sentences.en: the Sunday supplements
sentences.cn: 星期天的增刊

sentences.en: They had to get a job to supplement the family income.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不找一份工作以贴补家庭收入.

sentences.en: This full-colour supplement includes full race details, plus a comprehensive run-down on all the British hopefuls.
sentences.cn: 这份全彩附录包含了完整的比赛信息和对所有可能获胜的英国运动员的详细介绍。

sentences.en: vitamins and other dietary supplements
sentences.cn: 各种维生素和其他膳食补充剂

sentences.en: We must supplement human perception by mechanical devices.
sentences.cn: 我们都必须利用机械设备来弥补人类感官的不足.

sentences.en: You can avoid the single supplement by agreeing to share a twin room.
sentences.cn: 你若同意合住双人房间就可以省下单间附加费了。

words.tran_cn: 补充，[图情]补遗；补充物；附录

phrases.tran_cn: 食品强化剂；食物的补充
食品补充剂；保健品；营养品
营养补充品；营养增补剂

trans.tran_cn: 增补，补充，补充物，增刊，副刊
trans.tran_en: something that you add to something else to improve it or make it complete
something that you add to something else to improve it or make it complete
to add something, especially to what you earn or eat, in order to increase it to an acceptable level
to add something, especially to what you earn or eat, in order to increase it to an acceptable level
